statements: DELETE FROM PhishingLogs WHERE user_id = 100 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.100';
DELETE FROM PhishingLogs WHERE user_id = 123 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
DELETE FROM PhishingLogs WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM ip_addresses WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM phishing_emails WHERE id = 10 AND email_address = 'example@gmail.com'
DELETE FROM ip_addresses WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM exploitation_logs WHERE user_id = 100 AND ip_address = '192.168.1.10';
